thread.section_title: Smith & Noble Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Smith & Noble | smithandnoble.com
thread.title: East Taylor Dental Associates
thread.title_full: Smith & Noble reviewed by East Taylor Dental Associates

author: East Taylor Dental Associates
title: East Taylor Dental Associates
text: Since we do not have any Smith & Noble in-house reps in our area that could complete the entire order and install the blind, our rep, Daniel De Remer was awesome in helping us place the order for a very large blind that was motorized. It took a few extra people to help hang it because of it's size, but it looks awesome and works great! Couldn't be happier with the product, price and service!
